amendment.description: Amendment requires the Environmental Protection Agency to plan and coordinate endocrine disrupter research.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 18 in the Congressional Record of May 8, 1996, to require the EPA to coordinate research in the field of endocrine disruptors. The amendment directs the EPA to coordinate the research effort and to ensure that risk assesment measures are taken and that research is conducted in a scientific and reasonable manner.
